remarks: "Disamis", one of the syllogisms of Aristotelian logic.  Some ` ph ` is ` ps ` , and all ` ph ` is ` ch ` , therefore some ` ch ` is ` ps ` . (In Aristotelian notation, IAI-3:  MiP and MaS therefore SiP.) (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 28-Aug-2016.)
statement:
disamis.maj $e |- E. x ( ph /\ ps ) $.
disamis.min $e |- A. x ( ph -> ch ) $.
disamis $p |- E. x ( ch /\ ps ) $.
